version_description:
- Open CocCoc.Map app from a link in a third-party app and view full info about the place
- Full Vietnamese and English localization that can be changed on the fly
- Various bug fixes and UI improvements
Fixed critical problems experienced by some users

- Find your favorite places faster by switching from “suggestions” to “bookmarks”
- Updated category search for better browsing
- Added zoomable previews for location photos
- New location indicator shows which direction you’re facing for easier navigation
- Delete places from your history or bookmark list just by swiping
- Updated Facebook integration
- Fixed some annoying UI bugs and improved app stability to make your experience even better

- Added ability to open place links with directions
- Added business owner's login and voucher scanning feature

- Long-awaited iCloud synchronization for your search history and favorite places
- Improved drawing routes, now they stick to the map better
- Viewed search suggestions are now saved to your recent searches
- Some UI tweaks and fixes

+ Extended info of POIs - We've updated UI so you can find valuable information about places much easier
+ Save money on 3g - We've enhanced network usage so you could save money on mobile data

- Added ability to contact place by email, if the place has it
- Added ability to copy place link (“More”->”Copy link”)
- Fixed a couple of stability issues
- Fixed the issue with not updating previously saved places

We keep updating the app to make it better for you. Every update contains reliability and UI improvements. Thank you for using CốcCốc.Map!

Also in this update:
- You can now search previously opened places in Spotlight search
- We added a weather widget showing current weather near you, so you don't forget your raincoat or sunglasses
We keep updating the app to make it better for you. Every update contains reliability and UI improvements. Thank you for using CốcCốc.Map!
